description: President Biden promised to restore Roe v. Wade if Democrats retain House control and expand their Senate majority, saying that it would be the first bill he would sign into law in January.
title: Biden Vows to Codify Abortion Rights if Democrats Win Midterms
title_page: Biden Vows to Codify Abortion Rights if Democrats Win Midterms - The New York Times
